short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: MAKE SURE YOU NAVIGATE TO A SIGNED IN CANVAS PAGE TO BEGIN

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Streamline your academic journey with the Canvas GPA Calculator Chrome extension. Designed as a convenient pop-up for students using Canvas, this handy tool automatically populates your current courses and grades, allowing you to effortlessly calculate your GPA. Easily manage and store your credit counts for each course, ensuring accurate and convenient GPA calculations. Say goodbye to manual calculations and hello to academic success with the Canvas GPA Calculator.
